author: Simple History
description:
⚔️Join Heroes of History now using our link https://innogames.sng.link/Abqbt/yhos8/v95l&label=SimpleHistory and enter code SIMPLEHISTORY to unlock your first 5-STAR hero⚡Available only for new players!

Follow the final day of a World War II kamikaze pilot. This video tells the story of Aoki Kenji, a 21-year-old Zero pilot, from his last rituals and farewell letters to his final dive toward an American aircraft carrier at Okinawa. Set against Japan’s collapsing war effort, it explores the culture, beliefs, and pressure that drove young men to volunteer for one-way missions—and the human cost of turning sacrifice into duty.
